ValidationRule.description: Cannot change status to ready for review if Ready to convert field is Red and PO, frame Contract fields are not populated (For SWMP Proposals)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( Upsell_Status__c , 'Ready For Review'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'DS_SWMP_Proposals' ,
OR( PO__c = null, Frame_Contract__c = null, ISPICKVAL(Business_Rules_Check__c, 'Red') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Missing information: In order to move this Digital Proposal to Ready for Review, the following information is required: the Ready to Convert flag must be True, the CPO reference field needs to be populated, and the Agreement needs to be populated
